price: እነዚያም በጌታቸው አንቀጾች በተገሰጹ ጊዜ (የተረዱ ተቀባዮች ኾነው እንጂ) ደንቆሮዎችና ዕውሮች ኾነው በእርሷ ላይ የማይደፉት ናቸው፡፡
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ لَمۡ يَخِرُّواْ عَلَيۡهَا صُمّٗا وَعُمۡيَانٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā dhukkirū biāyāti rabbihim lam yakhirrū ʿalayhā ṣumman waʿum'yānan
